code:
graph TD 

    style tx3 fill:#844
    style µpay fill:#626
    style User0 fill:#444
    style User1 fill:#444
    style User2 fill:#444
    style Service0 fill:#559
    style Service1 fill:#559
    style Service2 fill:#559
    style Service3 fill:#559

    subgraph service smart contract
    %% µpay - services debit the user account for usage
    µpay(Education_ClassroomService)
    User0(Education_StudentDB) -.->|dt = -0.1| µpay
    Service0(Education_ClassroomService) -.->|dt = +0.1| µpay
    µpay -.-> User1(Education_GradeSync)
    µpay -.-> Service1(Education_ContentCDN)
    end

    subgraph withdrawal
    tx3(Education_LMS_Portal)
    User1(Education_GradeSync) -.-> tx3
    Service1(Education_LMS_Portal) -.-> tx3
    tx3 -.-> User2(Education_ClassroomService)
    tx3 -.-> Service2(Education_GradeSync)
    tx3 -.->|withdrawal| Service3(Education_ClassroomService)
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
